Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Do you want to design cutting-edge AI and ML solutions, work with advanced data models, and empower businesses with innovative analytics?

Nexer Insight is looking for a talented Data Scientist to join our team in Stockholm, Malmö, or Gothenburg. We invite you to embark on an exciting journey where you'll work with fascinating clients, tackle varied and challenging tasks, and enjoy exceptional benefits. At Nexer Insight, we are committed to leveraging advanced analytics, machine learning, and AI to drive innovation and deliver impactful solutions for our clients.

Nexer Insight

Nexer Insight is a company that embodies entrepreneurship and innovation. As a Data Scientist with us, you'll work with cutting-edge technologies, including LLMs (Large Language Models), RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and advanced AI solutions. We value teamwork, professional growth, and a vibrant community spirit. With us, you'll have the opportunity to work on exciting projects, collaborate with experts in the field, and make a meaningful impact in the intersection of data science and AI.

Key Responsibilities


Develop advanced AI/ML models and design solutions leveraging LLMs for various AI use cases, including RAG and intelligent agents.
Apply machine learning, statistical methods, and predictive modeling to solve real-world problems.
Build and deploy data pipelines and cloud-based architectures for ML workloads and MLOps.
Innovate and collaborate with clients to discover new business opportunities and develop tailored solutions.
Work with NLP, computer vision, and containerized applications to deliver high-impact projects.
Leverage platforms like Azure Databricks, Azure Data Lake, and Azure ML for scalable and efficient workflows.
Promote best practices for data science, from architecture and data quality to reliability and performance.



Who You Are

We expect you to have:


Minimum 4 years within Data Science
Strong understanding of LLMs and experience building solutions on top of them for AI-driven solutions.
Experience with RAG and AI-driven agents.
An analytical mindset and strong business acumen.
Problem-solving aptitude and a proactive mindset.
Hands-on experience with applied ML, statistics, and cloud architectures for MLOps.
Proficiency in Python, PySpark, and familiarity with tools like Databricks.
Knowledge of computer vision, NLP, SQL, and containerized apps.
Experience with Azure cloud services such as Azure ML and Azure Data Lake.
Fluency in Swedish and English.



Why Nexer Insight?

At Nexer Insight, we invest in our employees by providing professional development, certifications, and a vibrant working culture. With us, you'll be part of a team pushing boundaries and using advanced data science to create meaningful solutions for leading clients.

Are you ready to take the next step in your career and explore the forefront of AI and data science? Apply today and join us on this exciting journey!
Show more

Title: Data scientist till MedMera Bank
Description:
Data scientist till MedMera Bank




Ansök senast: 11 april 2025

Placering: Solna




Vi söker en vass Data Scientist till Team Data & Analys - är du redo för en ny utmaning?




På MedMera Bank tycker vi att det är viktigt att fatta beslut baserade på data och analys, därför är vårt team inom Data Science centralt för beslut på alla nivåer i banken. Gruppen har kommit långt i sitt arbete med maskininlärning och avancerad analys.




Vi är ett litet företag med snart 60 anställda som är snabbfotade i såväl beslut som implementation. Hos oss får du snabbt ta ansvar och lösa riktiga problem. Vi hjälper gärna våra kollegor att lyckas och våra medarbetarundersökningar visar att vi trivs och har roligt tillsammans. Teamet du kommer tillhöra kallas Data & Analys och består av tre data scientists och två data engineers.




Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter

Vi ansvarar för data, analys, och modellering av kreditrisk, prissättning och lönsamhet. Vårt huvudfokus är att skapa en lönsammare bank men vi hjälper också våra kollegor på andra avdelningar med rapportbehov och automatisering av återkommande arbetsuppgifter.




Vårt jobb är bland annat att sätta rätt pris till rätt kund för vår privatlånprodukt. Detta gör vi genom egenutvecklade ML-modeller, analyser och många diskussioner om olika vägval. Vi jobbar i Google Cloud Platform (bl.a. VertexAI och BigQuery) och programmerar i Python och SQL. Vår utvecklingsmiljö är modern och effektiv – vi tar hjälp av rätt verktyg på rätt plats och AI-stöd i arbetet är en självklarhet för att frigöra tid till det som verkligen gör skillnad.




Hos oss på MedMera Bank kommer du att arbeta direkt mot bankens ledningsgrupp, bland annat mot vår VD och kreditchef. Detta innebär att du har stora möjligheter att påverka de beslut banken tar i viktiga frågor. Det ställer också krav på dig att inte bara räkna rätt utan också att kunna förklara vad du kommit fram till på ett pedagogiskt sätt.




Teamet du kommer arbeta i är välfungerande och utmärker sig genom att vi hjälps åt, har roligt och löser komplexa problem tillsammans. Vi är också bra på att styra upp sociala aktiviteter som AW, brädspelskväll eller liknande. Nya initiativ är varmt välkomna!




Vem är du?

Vi söker dig som står på en stabil grund inom matematik, maskininlärning och programmering. Utöver det har du också en vilja att lära dig det du behöver kunna för att ta ditt arbete hela vägen från analys till produktion. Du har en pragmatisk inställning till din kompetens och de tekniker du använder – det viktiga är hur de kan användas för att generera insikter och driva lönsamhet.




Som person är du ödmjuk, gillar att samarbeta med andra, trivs med högt tempo och varierande arbetsuppgifter. I den här tjänsten finns det en stor möjlighet att lära sig både bank och data science och du kommer få utmanande uppgifter från start. Vi tror att det är viktigt att du litar på din egen analytiska förmåga för att lyckas i tjänsten.




Kvalifikationer

Vi söker dig som har;

Universitetsexamen inom kvantitativt område (till exempel civilingenjör, matematik, statistik eller data science).
Gedigna kunskaper i Python, eller annan programmeringserfarenhet som gör dig trygg oavsett miljö/språk.
Grundläggande kunskaper i SQL.
Egen drivkraft och förmåga att självständigt lära dig nya saker som du även kan applicera i arbetet för att lösa de problem du stöter på.
Goda kunskaper i svenska språket då vi dokumenterar och rapporterar mestadels på svenska.




Det är meriterande om du har;

Kunskap om GCP (eller annan molntjänst) och DevOps / MLOps.
Kunskap om bank och produkter som privatlån.
Kunskap om andra programmeringsspråk.
Erfarenhet från liknande arbetsuppgifter.
Ett dokumenterat intresse för programmering, exempelvis hobbyprojekt på Github.




Vi fäster stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper. Eftersom vi arbetar för en jämn könsfördelning ser vi gärna kvinnliga sökande till den här tjänsten. Har du frågor om tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till rekryterande chef, Kristofer Björnström, e-post; kristofer.bjornstrom@medmerabank.se. För att rättvist matcha kandidater med de krav som rollen ställer kommer vi att använda tester under urvalsarbetet.




Välkommen med din ansökan så snart som möjligt då vi jobbar löpande med urval och intervjuer!




Om företaget

MedMera Bank är ett helägt dotterbolag till KF. Sedan 2007 bedriver MedMera Bank bankverksamhet under Finansinspektionens tillsyn.




MedMera Banks uppdrag är att leverera medlemsnytta till kunderna och affärsnytta till Coop-butikerna och därigenom skapa lönsamhet som säkrar bankens framtid. MedMera Bank har idag ca 60 anställda.




Kontaktperson

Kristofer Björnström

kristofer.bjornstrom@medmerabank.se

Show more

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
På B3 Indes förvandlar vi data till värdefulla insikter som driver förändring och innovation. Vi skapar lösningar inom AI, Business Intelligence, Data Science och Automation för att maximera värdet av data och stärka företags konkurrenskraft. Vår styrka ligger i att kombinera passion för AI och data med en stark laganda, där vi stöttar varandra och löser utmaningar tillsammans.

Rollen som Data Scientist på B3

Hos oss får du chansen att jobba med några av Sveriges mest spännande kunder och projekt. Vad innebär det? Jo, att du får:


Gräva i data och hitta insikter som inte bara hjälper våra kunder – utan kanske till och med gör världen lite bättre.
Göra företag mer datadrivna och smartare genom att guida dem i rätt riktning.
Bygga och implementera avancerade lösningar – och faktiskt se dem göra skillnad!


Här handlar det inte bara om teknik – det handlar om att skapa verklig förändring. Vi gillar att tänka stort, experimentera och lösa kluriga problem tillsammans. Och det bästa? Du får ett team av grymma kollegor att bolla idéer med, lära dig av och ha kul ihop med!

Det är din passion för AI och data som gör skillnaden. Utöver det ser vi gärna:


Har du en universitetsutbildning inom matematik eller statistik? Toppen! Har du kanske skaffat motsvarande kunskaper genom arbetslivserfarenhet? Det funkar lika bra!
Minst 4 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet – vi letar efter någon som har hunnit samla på sig en del erfarenhet inom området.
Flytande svenska och engelska – eftersom båda språken används dagligen i arbetet.
Tidigare konsultroller är ett plus! Har du jobbat som konsult tidigare? Då är det en extra merit, men inget krav.


Men framför allt...

Har du erfarenhet av Machine Learning och Python? Grymt – det är värdefullt! Men vi lägger också stor vikt vid din förmåga att se helheten, skapa användbara lösningar men framförallt att du är nyfiken. Om du dessutom har koll på A/B-testning, modellering eller visualisering, är det ett plus – men absolut inget krav.

Varför välja B3 Indes?

💡 Utveckling & karriär – Väx i en entreprenörsdriven miljö där din kompetens får ta plats.

🌿 Balans & välmående – Vi värnar om ditt välbefinnande med stöd för wellness och en flexibel vardag.

🚀 Energi & gemenskap – Här präglas kulturen av öppenhet, nyfikenhet och en passion för att skapa något större – tillsammans.

❤️ Vi bryr oss – på riktigt – Vi engagerar oss i samhällsfrågor och samarbetar med initiativ som Suicide Zero, My Dream Now och Pink Programming för att göra skillnad även utanför arbetslivet.

En arbetsplats som gör skillnad:

Vi är stolta över att ha utsetts till ett av Sveriges fem främsta karriärföretag 2025 – en utmärkelse som speglar vår energi, nyfikenhet och vårt engagemang för att skapa en inkluderande och inspirerande arbetsplats. Här värdesätts olika perspektiv och idéer, och vi tror att det är just det som gör oss starkare.

Hos oss får du friheten att styra över dina uppdrag, din arbetstid och din utveckling. Vi erbjuder konkurrenskraftiga löner, flexibilitet att forma din vardag och en sund balans mellan jobb och fritid. Och vi vet att gemenskap är minst lika viktigt som teknik – därför satsar vi på allt från konferensresor och sommarfester till sköna AW:s där vi kan släppa jobbet för en stund.

Om B3 Consulting Group

B3 Consulting Group är ett expansivt konsultbolag med cirka 1000 medarbetare. Vi brinner för innovation och hjälper Sveriges ledande företag och organisationer att skapa framtidens möjligheter genom digital transformation. B3 finns på tolv orter i Sverige samt i Polen, med huvudkontor i Stockholm. Bolaget grundades 2003, är noterat på Nasdaq Stockholm Small Cap och omsatte 1 141 MSEK 2023.

Vi är stolta över vår prisbelönta företagskultur, där olikheter, erfarenheter och gemensam energi värdesätts. Som ett etiskt och transparent bolag strävar vi efter att ha en positiv påverkan på samhället, människor och miljön. Vi är även engagerade i Women in Tech och initiativ för att stärka AI-utbildning för kvinnor. 2024 utsågs vi till Årets Employer Branding-företag, och vår HR-chef vann titeln Årets HR-chef.

Är du redo att bli en del av ett företag där din passion för AI och data kan göra skillnad? Läs mer om oss och våra möjligheter här!
Show more

Vi skapar lösningar inom AI, Business Intelligence, Data Science och Automation för att maximera värdet av data och stärka företags konkurrenskraft. Vår styrka ligger i att kombinera passion för AI och data med en stark laganda, där vi stöttar varandra och löser utmaningar tillsammans.

Title: AI Developer
Description:
Do you want to be part of a team that is developing tomorrow's businesses and

organizations? At PwC Sweden, we share a common goal of contributing to something bigger than ourselves by building trust and transparency, making positive change, and creating long-term sustainable value. Together, we create a meaningful and rewarding career for you.

Become a part of PwC’s Internal Firm Services

As an employee within PwC's business support, you play an important role in ensuring that the organization operates smoothly and efficiently and delivers value to our clients and stakeholders. Within business support, there are six units that collaborate to support internal operations. We work with everything from communications, marketing, human resources, and IT to finance, procurement, risk management, and quality assurance. By coordinating and collaborating within these various departments, the organization can leverage our specialized knowledge to support and improve operations on a larger scale.

Are you our new colleague in the fast growing AI team?

Are you passionate about AI and eager to make a tangible impact? We are looking for a developer who excels in collaboration and enjoys building strong relationships with colleagues to ideate and develop exciting AI solutions. You are naturally curious and adaptable, finding joy in solving complex problems. You take pride in your personal responsibility and are driven to achieve outstanding results.

We offer opportunities for your continuous professional growth, supported by the

collaborative environment within the work environment you're part of. A strong

inclination to collaboration is essential, as you will often work in diverse environments and support different business units.

Your Main Tasks Would Include


Lead the deployment and continuous maintenance of machine learning models


and AI solutions, ensuring high performance and effectiveness in solving

business challenges.


Assist in the design and development of machine learning models and AI


solutions to address business problems.


Assist in the development and maintenance of product pipelines.
Stay current with the latest advancements and industry trends in AI, and apply


them to improve existing processes.


Participate in training sessions and workshops to enhance skills and knowledge,


fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.

Qualifications For The Position


Relevant education, preferably in Computer Science, Data Science,


Mathematics, Electronics or a related field.


Proficiency in Python.
Practical understanding of generative AI frameworks (vector databases,


LangChain frameworks, OpenAI frameworks,etc).


Experience working with technical requirements, development, testing, etc.
Experience implementing machine learning frameworks and libraries (e.g.,


scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch).


Excellent communication, presentation and collaboration skills.
Ability to work effectively and adapt to diverse and dynamic environments.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Proficiency in both spoken and written English.
Collaborate with the global PwC network to identify opportunities for AI


innovations and drive the implementation of new technologies and

methodologies to PwC Sweden.

,

Recruitment Process

We will review applications continuously, and the position may be filled earlier than the application deadline.

Please Attach The Following Documents To Your Application


CV
Cover letter


We believe in having a recruitment process that applies to everyone. As part of the selection, we use psychometric tests to ensure an objective, unbiased, and fair selection. The tests are the first step in our selection process. You will receive a link to these tests after we have received your application.

We value the personal meeting to understand the value you can bring to PwC and what we can offer you. The interview process usually consists of multiple stages and various types of interviews. When meeting with HR, you will have a competency-based interview where we examine the personality test you completed before the interview. During the interview with the business, you will have the opportunity to meet with the relevant team to discuss the role. We call for interviews continuously, and we encourage you to apply as soon as possible.

Read more about who we are, and how we are safeguarding inclusion and diversity through our recruiting at www.pwc.se/karriar.

Do you have questions? Let us know!

Questions relating to the job will be answered by Nithin Virinchipuram,

nithin.virinchipuram@pwc.com

If you instead have questions about the recruitment process or your application, reach out to the recruiter: Michaela Lindgren at Michaela.lindgren@pwc.com
Show more

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Vi söker en driven och kunnig Data Scientist eller Machine Learning Engineer till vårt Recommendation Engine-team på ICA Sverige. I denna roll kommer du att analysera och tolka stora mängder data samt designa, bygga och implementera maskininlärningsmodeller för att lösa affärsutmaningar. Du kommer att arbeta med att implementera och optimera data pipelines för att säkerställa effektiv drift och nyttjande av driftsatta modeller. Dessutom kommer du att visualisera och presentera insikter för både tekniska och icke-tekniska intressenter.

Är du den vi söker?

Vi söker dig som har relevant erfarenhet med en kombination av maskininlärning, data science och data engineering med stark matematisk kompetens. Du bör ha minst 3 års erfarenhet av dataanalys och att utveckla och implementera maskininlärningsmodeller. Stark programmeringskunskap, helst i Python, och erfarenhet av att bearbeta data med SQL är ett krav. Erfarenhet av att arbeta på en Cloud-plattform, helst GCP, är meriterande.

Därför ska du välja ICA

Hos ICA får du möjlighet att arbeta i en dynamisk och innovativ miljö där du kan utvecklas och växa. Vi värdesätter mångfald och strävar efter att spegla våra kunder och samhället. Vi erbjuder en flexibel arbetsplats och möjligheten att arbeta med spännande projekt som gör skillnad. I denna roll kommer du att samarbeta nära med kollegor inom Customer Solutions, Försäljning och Marknad för att skapa värdefulla lösningar för våra kunder.

Vad händer nu?

Ansök så snart som möjligt men senast 1 april, vi gör löpande urval. För mer information om tjänsten, kontakta Markus Koppari på 072-2202831.

Om ICA

ICA ska spegla våra kunder och samhället, vi strävar därför efter att anställa människor med olika bakgrund, kompetenser, kunskap och erfarenheter. Om roller kräver det så behöver du genomgå tester, bakgrundskontroller och drogtestning innan anställning.

Läs mer om hur det är att jobba på ICA.
Show more

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
Om tjänsten

Som AI Engineer kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att designa och utveckla AI-lösningar baserade på verksamhetens krav.

Du blir en del av Cloud Platform-teamet, som hanterar AI-lösningar främst i det publika molnet. Här kommer du att stötta och guida våra utvecklingsteam och verksamheten med din expertis inom AI. Teamet strävar efter ständig förbättring, och du kommer att ha stora möjligheter till personlig utveckling.

Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer att inkludera:



Designa, utveckla och driftsätta gen-AI drivna applikationer och lösningar.
Samarbeta med olika intressenter för att förstå verksamhetens behov.
Stödja utvecklingsteam och verksamheten med AI-drivna lösningar.
Utveckla och upprätthålla AI-verktyg och infrastruktur.
Utvärdera effektiviteten av gen-AI drivna applikationer.
Hålla dig uppdaterad med de senaste framstegen inom AI och maskininlärning.
Förklara komplexa tekniska idéer för icke-tekniska intressenter.


Vem vi sökerVi önskar att du uppfyller följande punkter:



Gedigen erfarenhet av arbete med Azure-tjänster, särskilt inom AI.
Gedigen kunskap om Generativ AI.
Stark programmeringsförmåga i språk som Python & .NET.
Erfarenhet av att arbeta i en DevOps-kultur och med verktyg som AzureDevOps och GitHub.
Högskoleutbildning inom datavetenskap, teknik, matematik eller motsvarande kunskap genom arbetslivserfarenhet.
Goda kunskaper i svenska OCH engelska.


Det är meriterande om du även:



Är certifierad inom AI.
Har praktisk erfarenhet av AI Assistenter.
Erfarenhet av att arbeta med vektordatabaser och retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).
Har erfarenhet av att arbeta med Azure AI Studio för utveckling av AI-lösningar.
Har erfarenhet av att arbeta agilt.


Vi erbjuder

Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta i framkanten av AI-teknologi och vara en del av vår spännande resa mot att bli ett ännu mer datadrivet och AI-fokuserat företag. Vi erbjuder en dynamisk arbetsmiljö där din expertis kommer att vara avgörande för vår framgång.

Vi erbjuder en spännande och utvecklande miljö där du får möjlighet till en intern karriär. Du får en omväxlande vardag tillsammans med härliga kollegor - vi arbetar i nära samarbete mellan de nordiska länderna för att ge våra gäster de bästa veckorna på året. Vi har dessutom ett högt medarbetarengagemang som år efter år visar sig i vår interna medarbetarundersökning.

Vi älskar vårt jobb och välkomnar dig ombord på vår resa i Nordic Leisure Travel Group!

Ansök nu och var med och forma framtiden för AI i vår organisation!

Övrigt

Urval sker löpande, så vi välkomnar din ansökan så snart som möjlig.

I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av tester från Alva Labs – ett logiskt problemlösningstest och ett personlighetstest. Testerna utgår från vedertagen forskning och ger oss möjlighet att på ett opartiskt sätt bedöma dina styrkor och eventuella utmaningar i relation till aktuell tjänst. Om du uppfyller grundkraven hos oss kommer du att få testerna skickade till dig och även mer information om dessa, men om du är nyfiken redan nu kan du läsa mer om dem hos Alva Labs .

Vill du veta mer om tjänsten kontakta Carlos Cederfeldt (carlos cederfeldt@nltg.com).

Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

Ving ingår i den nordiska resekoncernen Nordic Leisure Travel Group. I gruppen ingår researrangörerna Ving Sverige, Globetrotter, Ving Norge, Spies i Danmark, Tjäreborg i Finland, flygbolaget Sunclass Airlines samt våra egna hotellkoncept Sunwing Family Resorts, Ocean Beach Club och Sunprime Hotels. Gruppen säljer ett normalt år runt 1 500 000 resor i de nordiska länderna.

Vi är ett företag där vi har roligt och bryr oss om varandra med vårt people promise "it should be fun, developing and rewarding doing a good job".

Arbetsområde

IT

Roll: Technology Services

Platser: Stockholm

Distansarbete: Hybridarbete

Anställningsform: Heltid

Startdatum

Enligt överenskommelse

Kontaktperson: Carlos Cederfeldt (carlos.cederfeldt@nltg.com)
Show more

  • Gedigen erfarenhet av arbete med Azure-tjänster, särskilt inom AI.
  • Gedigen kunskap om Generativ AI.
  • Stark programmeringsförmåga i språk som Python & .NET.
  • Erfarenhet av att arbeta i en DevOps-kultur och med verktyg som AzureDevOps och GitHub.
  • Högskoleutbildning inom datavetenskap, teknik, matematik eller motsvarande kunskap genom arbetslivserfarenhet.
  • Goda kunskaper i svenska OCH engelska.

Det är meriterande om du även:


  • Är certifierad inom AI.
  • Har praktisk erfarenhet av AI Assistenter.
  • Erfarenhet av att arbeta med vektordatabaser och retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).
  • Har erfarenhet av att arbeta med Azure AI Studio för utveckling av AI-lösningar.
  • Har erfarenhet av att arbeta agilt.

Vi erbjuder

Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta i framkanten av AI-teknologi och vara en del av vår spännande resa mot att bli ett ännu mer datadrivet och AI-fokuserat företag. Vi erbjuder en dynamisk arbetsmiljö där din expertis kommer att vara avgörande för vår framgång.

Vi erbjuder en spännande och utvecklande miljö där du får möjlighet till en intern karriär. Du får en omväxlande vardag tillsammans med härliga kollegor - vi arbetar i nära samarbete mellan de nordiska länderna för att ge våra gäster de bästa veckorna på året. Vi har dessutom ett högt medarbetarengagemang som år efter år visar sig i vår interna medarbetarundersökning.

Vi älskar vårt jobb och välkomnar dig ombord på vår resa i Nordic Leisure Travel Group!

Ansök nu och var med och forma framtiden för AI i vår organisation!

Övrigt

Urval sker löpande, så vi välkomnar din ansökan så snart som möjlig.

I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av tester från Alva Labs – ett logiskt problemlösningstest och ett personlighetstest. Testerna utgår från vedertagen forskning och ger oss möjlighet att på ett opartiskt sätt bedöma dina styrkor och eventuella utmaningar i relation till aktuell tjänst. Om du uppfyller grundkraven hos oss kommer du att få testerna skickade till dig och även mer information om dessa, men om du är nyfiken redan nu kan du läsa mer om dem hos Alva Labs .

Vill du veta mer om tjänsten kontakta Carlos Cederfeldt (carlos cederfeldt@nltg.com).

Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

Ving ingår i den nordiska resekoncernen Nordic Leisure Travel Group. I gruppen ingår researrangörerna Ving Sverige, Globetrotter, Ving Norge, Spies i Danmark, Tjäreborg i Finland, flygbolaget Sunclass Airlines samt våra egna hotellkoncept Sunwing Family Resorts, Ocean Beach Club och Sunprime Hotels. Gruppen säljer ett normalt år runt 1 500 000 resor i de nordiska länderna.

Vi är ett företag där vi har roligt och bryr oss om varandra med vårt people promise "it should be fun, developing and rewarding doing a good job".

Arbetsområde

IT

Roll: Technology Services

Platser: Stockholm

Distansarbete: Hybridarbete

Anställningsform: Heltid

Startdatum

Enligt överenskommelse

Kontaktperson: Carlos Cederfeldt (carlos.cederfeldt@nltg.com)

Title: Staff Data Scientist (New Verticals)
Description:
About Wolt

At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.

Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.

About The New Verticals Group

The New Verticals Group is all about expanding Wolt beyond Restaurants and helping deliver anything our Customers want with unprecedented convenience and world-leading customer experience. We want to make Wolt the best place to order what you need, be it groceries, convenience, pharmacy, electronics, home, pet stores, clothing, or other goods. Our vision is to make Wolt the world’s best shopping mall, in your pocket.

We work closely together with cross-functional teams to ensure that we have solid organic and inorganic growth plans, that we execute those perfectly in our country operations, and disseminate best practices across the organization to reduce the growth pains of rapid scaling (it always hurts when you grow >2x per year!)

About The Marketing & Affordability Analytics Team

Our Marketing & Affordability Analytics team uncovers insights on growth opportunities and consumer experience. We partner with Product, Engineering and Business teams to guide measurement and tactical decision-making using advanced analytics as we expand the Wolt platform across the globe.

You’ll collaborate with top Data Science and Analytics Engineering professionals who take ownership of the business outcomes. As we’re looking to grow to the next level of maturity, you’ll play a key role in establishing analytical expertise in various business domains.

About The Role

We’re looking for an awesome Staff Data Scientist in Helsinki, Berlin or Stockholm. You will be the partner for the New Verticals business and act as the go-getter analytics expert of your domain. You’ll have an opportunity to make a domain-wide impact, by partnering with senior leaders closely and driving the action from the frontlines.

The scope of the role ranges from helping cross-functional teams use various data points to size the potential opportunities, identifying and measuring levers to help move essential metrics, leveraging your technical and analytical skills to tell stories about business performance and make recommendations, and aligning executives around what matters and why.

Our offering to you


The online delivery platform that Wolt is building will offer you interesting and complex challenges together with the opportunities to create a big impact with your skills. Lots of geolocational and temporal data in real-time combined with differences in the economics and dynamics of the cities we operate in make Wolt both a challenging and so interesting company to practice analytics.
You can choose the location from our tech hubs Helsinki, Berlin and Stockholm, or you can work entirely remotely anywhere in Finland, Germany, Sweden and Estonia. You have the chance to decide the ways of working — a hybrid, at the office, or remote within the location above. 💙 Read more about our remote setup.
You would get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, we think big but stay humble, do right by people, we treat others kindly and justly, recognize that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement. Read more about how we work.


Out humble expectations


Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
6+ years of experience in a Data Analytics or Data Science position
Expertise with SQL and statistical analysis using Python, R, or equivalent.
Strong know-how on experimentation techniques (A/B testing, causal inference) and hypothesis testing.
Ability to build intuitive data visualizations and dashboards that influence critical business decisions on senior leadership level, utilizing tools like Looker, Tableau, Mixpanel, or similar.
Clear and concise communication with strong cross-functional partnership experience.
Relentless pursuit of new ideas and data sources, and have the ability to systematically tackle ambiguous problems with a data-driven, hypothesis-based approach independently.
Ability to work and communicate effectively in English.


Next steps

The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!

The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.

For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Zhanna Filintseva (zhanna.filintseva@wolt.com)

Notice to Applicants for Jobs Located in NYC or Remote Jobs Associated With Office in NYC Only

We use Covey as part of our hiring and/or promotional process for jobs in NYC and certain features may qualify it as an AEDT in NYC. As part of the hiring and/or promotion process, we provide Covey with job requirements and candidate submitted applications. We began using Covey Scout for Inbound from August 21, 2023, through December 21, 2023, and resumed using Covey Scout for Inbound again on June 29, 2024.

The Covey tool has been reviewed by an independent auditor. Results of the audit may be viewed here: Covey

Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion

We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.
Show more

We use Covey as part of our hiring and/or promotional process for jobs in NYC and certain features may qualify it as an AEDT in NYC. We began using Covey Scout for Inbound from August 21, 2023, through December 21, 2023, and resumed using Covey Scout for Inbound again on June 29, 2024.

The Covey tool has been reviewed by an independent auditor. Results of the audit may be viewed here: Covey

Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion

We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

Title: AI Applied Engineer
Description:
About Lovable...




We’re Lovable: a small, ambitious crew of serial founders, physicists, competitive programmers, and product engineers.

Our goal? Be the first to make autonomous code generation work.

We’re pioneering a new way for anyone to create and maintain web apps using plain English. Combining LLMs + novel UX + clever algorithms, we’re building a bridge between coders and non-coders.




The role: AI Applied Engineer




You’ll be at the cutting edge of autonomous coding, ensuring that our product is robust, reliable, and continually pushing the frontier of what’s possible.

Your mission is to identify the biggest challenges impacting reliability—and come up with inventive, creative solutions. This isn’t just about making things work; it’s about making them unfailingly excellent and scalable.




What you’ll do:




Push the Limits: Identify bottlenecks and failure points in our code generation pipeline and devise ingenious ways to overcome them.
Innovate & Iterate: Experiment with state-of-the-art reliability techniques for LLMs and autonomous agents.
Rapid Debugging: Pinpoint and resolve complex reliability issues with speed and precision.
Data-Driven Improvements: Analyze reliability patterns, run failure analyses, and implement strategies to boost accuracy and performance.
Dogfood to the Max: Rigorously use our own product for internal development, pushing it to the limit in real-world scenarios, surface edge cases, break things (on purpose), and refine the product from the inside out.




What we’re looking for:




Full-Stack Proficiency: Experience working with full-stack applications, preferably using React on the frontend.
Experience with LLMs: Practical experience working with LLMs and their quirks.
Inventive Problem-Solving: You see challenges as puzzles waiting to be cracked, and you bring unconventional ideas to the table.
Fast Debugger: You can quickly identify, analyze, and fix complex AI Applied issues.
Bias for Action: You move fast, experiment, and iterate; shipping solutions is in your DNA.
Curiosity for the Cutting Edge: You stay up-to-date with the latest research and apply it pragmatically.
Strong Communication: Ability to clearly explain reliability challenges, solutions, and trade-offs to both technical and non-technical teammates.




Why Lovable?




Change the world, literally: 2025 is the year AI works, and Lovable has the best AI full stack engineer product (According to industry veterans)
Work, learn, have fun: We're building the strongest technical team in Europe. You will shape our culture and be inspired in a place of exceptional talent density
Build a unique network: Lovable is a global top AI brand that the world is eager to work with. You will meet and work with some of the most important people in tech
Get autonomy & ownership: With lots of things being built, this is a unique opportunity to get ownership and have a true impact on our product
Compensation: Lovable pays top of market cash and equity, and is committed to compensate better than any other company in Sweden on a performance basis




If you’re ready to help build the last piece of software—we want to hear from you. Let’s make something Lovable.




About your application:




Please submit your application in English; it’s our company language so you’ll be speaking lots of it if you join.
We treat all candidates equally: If you are interested please apply through our application system.
We’re on a mission to make everyone feel valued at work. That’s only achievable if our team reflects the diversity of the world around us - and that starts with you. Hit apply, even if you are worried you might not tick all the boxes! We embrace and encourage people from all backgrounds to apply - regardless of race/ethnicity, colour, religion, nationality, gender, sex, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, neurodiversity, socio-economic status, culture or beliefs.
Show more

Hit apply, even if you are worried you might not tick all the boxes! We embrace and encourage people from all backgrounds to apply - regardless of race/ethnicity, colour, religion, nationality, gender, sex, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, neurodiversity, socio-economic status, culture or beliefs.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Trustly is leading the human-centric payments revolution. To us, this means passionately building the most convenient, intelligent and responsible way of paying for things online. Whether it’s for shopping, paying subscriptions, funding trading accounts, booking airfare, playing online games and much more – we’re all about a better way to pay. At our core, we are a tech company with industry-leading tech capabilities. But, it’s the ingenuity of our people that makes us leaders in our field. Thus, our appetite for innovation will never be anything less than fierce. Trustly is steadily growing as it connects thousands of businesses with hundreds of millions of people. And with a strong presence across Europe and the Americas, we are leading the human-centric payment revolution as a truly global team.




About the Data domain

The Data domain is part of the Product and Tech function with the mission of transforming Trustly into a truly data-driven organization. We are responsible for every aspect of the data journey, from collection & modeling to analysis and visualization. We provide the whole organization with data and analytics artifacts aiming to improve our decisions, operations and the customer’s experience.

About the role

We are seeking a talented Machine Learning Engineer to join our Machine Learning team. As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will work on building and deploying machine learning models that will help drive and automate critical business decisions within our product services. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge ML applications, collaborate with a multidisciplinary team, and take ownership of end-to-end machine learning lifecycles. If you're passionate about ML and AI, problem-solving, and building scalable solutions, we’d love to have you on board.




What you’ll do
Model Development & Optimization: Develop end-to-end pipelines to deploy machine learning models into production environments and continuously improve model performance through feature selection, hyperparameter tuning and model lifecycle management
Data Pipeline Design & Management: Build and maintain efficient data pipelines for data collection, preprocessing, and feature transformation to ensure high-quality near real-time input for ML models
Performance Monitoring: Monitor and evaluate feature drift and the performance of deployed models, ensuring they meet business requirements and adjusting as necessary to maintain a high level of model performance over time
Collaborate Across Teams: Work closely with data scientists, software engineers, architects and product managers to understand the business needs and translate them into scalable machine learning products
Stay Ahead of Trends: Keep up with the latest advancements in machine learning and AI technologies, applying new methodologies and tools to enhance the effectiveness of your work





Who you are
Experience: You have 5+ years of hands-on experience developing and deploying machine learning models in a production environment with near real-time latency
Education: You have a Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or a related field

Technical Skills:
Proficient in programming languages like Python, Java, or C++
Experience with ML frameworks such as Sagemaker, MLFlow, TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch and similar frameworks
Strong understanding of machine learning algorithms, statistics, and optimization techniques
Experience working with ML Operations, model lifecycle, infrastructure as code and CI/CD pipelines for model deployment
Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Google Cloud, and deploying ML models at scale in said platforms
Experience with big data tools and distributed computing (e.g., Spark, Apache Beam/Flink)
Experience working with streaming data pipelines in Kafka (or similar)
Knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git) and containerization tools (e.g., Docker)
Experience within open banking is a plus but not required








Are you someone who voices new ideas and acts on them? Do you value great communication with all stakeholders? We are looking to strengthen the team with dedicated, highly motivated people who thrive in working with different areas across the organisation.

If you feel that your skill set and personality compliments the criteria above, apply now and kindly submit your CV in English.

Show more

Title: Applied Ai Engineer
Description:
YOUR MISSION AT VOI

As the Applied AI Engineer, you will play an important role in unlocking the potential of Gen AI throughout our organisation. Your hands-on approach and focus on applying Gen AI to address real-world challenges will be key in driving innovation and efficiency. This role offers a platform for you to make a significant impact, with the freedom to execute on our Gen AI strategy, discover high-value applications, and take lead on technical implementation.

Role

Imagine building transformative solutions like implementing real-time actions based on rider feedback from the app or creating a diagnosis and repairs co-pilot for mechanics and in-field workers. These are just a glimpse of the exciting and impactful projects you will spearhead in this role, shaping the way we leverage AI technology. This will include:


Developing frameworks and tooling that make it easier for R&D teams to integrate Gen AI into products.
Designing and building pragmatic, production-ready Gen AI solutions for various business use cases.
Working with teams across the company to understand their challenges and apply AI where it creates real value.
Balancing innovation with practicality, ensuring we use the right AI tools for the job rather than chasing the latest trends.
Ensuring solutions are scalable, cost-efficient, and secure, following best practices for deploying AI in production.
Staying up to date with the rapidly evolving AI landscape and helping define our AI adoption strategy.


What You Need To Embark

To have the best possible start with us, we believe you have:


Software engineering background, ideally in backend or ML development and system integration.
Experience using Gen AI/LLM technologies in production (e.g., OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, vector databases, RAG, AI agents).
Curiosity and pragmatism – you focus on delivering value, not just exploring technology.
Experience building AI-powered applications that integrate with real-world systems.
Ability to work autonomously, define your own roadmap, and drive projects forward.
Strong collaboration skills – comfortable working with technical and non-technical teams alike.


WHY VOI?

Working At Voi Is More Than Just a Job; Our People Promise Includes a Personal Voyage Where You Will Grow As a Professional And Be a Part Of a Team And Culture That Builds Something Meaningful For Society. In Addition To This You’ll Have The Opportunity To


Join Europe’s #1 micromobility operator and one of the fastest growing scaleups
Get “skin in the game” through our employee options program
Lead the future product generations of our vehicles and push the company further towards our product vision and overarching mission of providing “safe, affordable and sustainable micromobility for everyone”
Join the micromobility-revolution and be a part of creating sustainable cities made for living, free from noise and pollution


Since 2018, Voi has been on a mission to create safe, sustainable and reliable micromobility for everyone. Today we are the leading shared micromobility operator in Europe, with HQ in Stockholm (Sweden), operating 100,000+ vehicles in 100+ towns and cities across 12 countries, serving 7+ million riders with over 300+ MILLION rides to date, and we have no intention of stopping here! We believe that micromobility will play a central role in changing how people move in our towns and cities in the future and want to ensure that the micromobility transformation happens the right way - through real innovative technology, partnership and transparent dialogue with towns, cities and governments, and by adapting our products to the local needs. In addition to improving quality of life in cities around the world, we are contributing to the solution for climate change by making sustainable transportation options more widely available and promoting renewable energy use and circularity along our supply chain.

Diversity Matters

As a Voiager, we offer you a friendly and fast-paced workplace where you can bring your whole self to work, regardless of gender, age, ethnicity, religion, disability or sexual orientation - and welcome applications from whoever you are, including veterans, those actively serving as a Reservist and their partners. What is most important to us is how you treat others and what skills and value you bring to our team. We believe that having a wide diversity of people with different backgrounds and perspectives within Voi is essential to our success in delivering the best user experience to our equally diverse user base. With employees from over 50 nationalities working within Voi, we believe we have made good progress but know we can still do more - therefore we discourage any photos, personal letters, or disclosure of any information that concerns other information than your professional experience.
Show more
HTML:
YOUR MISSION AT VOI

As the Applied AI Engineer, you will play an important role in unlocking the potential of Gen AI throughout our organisation. Your hands-on approach and focus on applying Gen AI to address real-world challenges will be key in driving innovation and efficiency. This role offers a platform for you to make a significant impact, with the freedom to execute on our Gen AI strategy, discover high-value applications, and take lead on technical implementation.

Role

Imagine building transformative solutions like implementing real-time actions based on rider feedback from the app or creating a diagnosis and repairs co-pilot for mechanics and in-field workers. These are just a glimpse of the exciting and impactful projects you will spearhead in this role, shaping the way we leverage AI technology. This will include:

  • Developing frameworks and tooling that make it easier for R&D teams to integrate Gen AI into products.
  • Designing and building pragmatic, production-ready Gen AI solutions for various business use cases.
  • Working with teams across the company to understand their challenges and apply AI where it creates real value.
  • Balancing innovation with practicality, ensuring we use the right AI tools for the job rather than chasing the latest trends.
  • Ensuring solutions are scalable, cost-efficient, and secure, following best practices for deploying AI in production.
  • Staying up to date with the rapidly evolving AI landscape and helping define our AI adoption strategy.

What You Need To Embark

To have the best possible start with us, we believe you have:

  • Software engineering background, ideally in backend or ML development and system integration.
  • Experience using Gen AI/LLM technologies in production (e.g., OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, vector databases, RAG, AI agents).
  • Curiosity and pragmatism – you focus on delivering value, not just exploring technology.
  • Experience building AI-powered applications that integrate with real-world systems.
  • Ability to work autonomously, define your own roadmap, and drive projects forward.
  • Strong collaboration skills – comfortable working with technical and non-technical teams alike.

WHY VOI?

Working At Voi Is More Than Just a Job; Our People Promise Includes a Personal Voyage Where You Will Grow As a Professional And Be a Part Of a Team And Culture That Builds Something Meaningful For Society. In Addition To This You’ll Have The Opportunity To

  • Join Europe’s #1 micromobility operator and one of the fastest growing scaleups
  • Get “skin in the game” through our employee options program
  • Lead the future product generations of our vehicles and push the company further towards our product vision and overarching mission of providing “safe, affordable and sustainable micromobility for everyone”
  • Join the micromobility-revolution and be a part of creating sustainable cities made for living, free from noise and pollution

Since 2018, Voi has been on a mission to create safe, sustainable and reliable micromobility for everyone. Today we are the leading shared micromobility operator in Europe, with HQ in Stockholm (Sweden), operating 100,000+ vehicles in 100+ towns and cities across 12 countries, serving 7+ million riders with over 300+ MILLION rides to date, and we have no intention of stopping here! We believe that micromobility will play a central role in changing how people move in our towns and cities in the future and want to ensure that the micromobility transformation happens the right way - through real innovative technology, partnership and transparent dialogue with towns, cities and governments, and by adapting our products to the local needs. In addition to improving quality of life in cities around the world, we are contributing to the solution for climate change by making sustainable transportation options more widely available and promoting renewable energy use and circularity along our supply chain.

Diversity Matters

As a Voiager, we offer you a friendly and fast-paced workplace where you can bring your whole self to work, regardless of gender, age, ethnicity, religion, disability or sexual orientation - and welcome applications from whoever you are, including veterans, those actively serving as a Reservist and their partners. What is most important to us is how you treat others and what skills and value you bring to our team. We believe that having a wide diversity of people with different backgrounds and perspectives within Voi is essential to our success in delivering the best user experience to our equally diverse user base. With employees from over 50 nationalities working within Voi, we believe we have made good progress but know we can still do more - therefore we discourage any photos, personal letters, or disclosure of any information that concerns other information than your professional experience.

Title: Data Scientist & Startup Founder (March 2025)
Description:
This ad is not for an employment, but an opportunity to build a VC-backed startup from the ground up.




Who you are:

You are a highly skilled technical professional with a proven track record in developing innovative solutions. Your strong programming abilities and experience in building complex algorithms enable you to address critical challenges within the tech industry. You are a proactive individual with a passion for progress, driven to make a significant impact through cutting-edge technological advancements.




The Antler Founder Residency

Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.

12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success!




Program Details

Start Date: March 3rd, 2025
Location: Onsite at our Stockholm office
Compensation: While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
Visa Sponsorship: Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.




For our March 2025 cohort, we're looking for someone who:

Excel in Data Science, Machine Learning, or AI, with a knack for advancing technology.
Can unearth insights from intricate data, leading in ML methodologies.
Embrace the challenge of merging diverse data for revolutionary models.
Are adept at prototyping innovative solutions that pave the way for real-world applications.
Navigate product development with strategic foresight and precision.
Experienced in the start-up ecosystem
Optional: have an idea that solves a problem you’re passionate about, but you understand the need for co-pilots who share your vision and values




Application Process

Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:

Apply through our website.
Participate in an introductory interview.
Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
Receive a potential offer.




Meet Our Nordic Success Stories:

Wingbits: A community-driven flight data tracking platform
Two: A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
Evyon: A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
Glint Solar: Software accelerating identification of optimal solar installation sites.
PerPlant: AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture.
Show more

Title: Software Developer
Description:
Utveckla framtiden med oss

Omegapoint är ett konsultföretag som skapar framtidens digitala tjänster. Vi fortsätter att växa och letar nu efter dig som har några års erfarenhet av systemutveckling.




Brinner du för säkerhet inom systemutveckling?

I denna roll blir du en viktig spelare i vårt team och vi tror därför att du är en teamplayer med högt ansvarstagande och kvalitétstänk. Du trivs i kundrelationerna där du är en både strukturerad och engagerad rådgivare och har förmåga att omsätta dina kunskaper i konkreta lösningar. Du är van att agera självständigt och inte rädd för att ta egna initiativ. Som person tror vi vidare att du är öppen, positiv och trivs i en organisation präglad av kompetensutveckling där vi är vassa och snälla mot varandra.

Att du vill dela med dig av din kompetens till dina kollegor genom exempelvis mentorskap eller att delta på våra interna kompetensdagar tycker vi är en självklarhet. Vi bygger och stärker vår fina kompetenskultur tillsammans!




För den här tjänsten tror vi även att du:

har minst tre års erfarenhet av programmering i Java, C#/.NET eller liknande
arbetar kvalitetsinriktat och känner dig bekväm med såväl testdriven utveckling som automatiserade tester
har kunskap kring IaC, pipelines och traditionell DevOps/DevSecOps
eventuellt har erfarenhet av domändriven design
har arbetat med agila utvecklingsmetoder
har en akademisk examen eller motsvarande
behärskar svenska i tal och skrift




Om oss

Omegapoint grundades 2001 och är Norra Europas ledande konsultbolag inom cybersäker digitalisering. Med en vision om en framtid där vi fullt ut kan lita på teknik använder vi vår expertis för att säkra våra kunders och medarbetares utveckling. Vi är vassa och snälla, något som karaktäriseras av vår kompetensutvecklingskultur och viljan att dela vår kunskap med varandra. För närvarande är vi över 900 anställda konsulter i Stockholm, Oslo, Drammen, Köpenhamn, Göteborg, Malmö, Örebro, Västerås, Enköping, Uppsala och Umeå.




Vi satsar på dig

På Omegapoint sätter vi din kompetens i centrum och ger dig alla förutsättningar för ett utvecklande och varierat jobb. Som konsult hos oss tillbringar du vardagen i uppdrag hos någon av våra kunder, men har alltid en välkomnande hemmahamn på kontoret i centrala Stockholm. Här ordnar vi mängder av aktiviteter under året för att vi ska utvecklas och ligga i framkant. Det är en del i vår kompetenskultur som bygger på samarbete och en vilja att stärka varandra.




Med en stor och varierande kundbas, från små specialistföretag till stora och välkända företag och myndigheter, har vi en möjlighet att erbjuda utmanande och roliga uppdrag.




Givetvis erbjuder vi även allt det andra som är viktigt, som marknadsmässiga löner, förstärkt föräldralön, anpassade förmånspaket, friskvårdsbidrag, sjukvårdsförsäkring och möjlighet till delägarskap.




Vi vågar lova dig en arbetsplats där du kommer att trivas, utvecklas och ges alla möjligheter till en ljus framtid.

Show more

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
B3 Link, som är en del av B3-koncernen, är bland annat unika genom vår expertis inom AI-tillämpningar och förmåga att leverera projekt till våra kunder. Vi kombinerar teknik och affärsbehov, och tar ansvar för hela projektcykeln – från business case till implementering av AI-lösningar.

Om rollen

Nu söker vi dig som har erfarenhet inom maskininlärning! Att vara anställd på B3 Link innebär att du hjälper våra kunder i deras utvecklingsprojekt och dagliga utmaningar. Vi ser gärna att du har vana att arbeta såväl självständigt som kundnära och är van vid ett agilt teambaserat arbetssätt.

Vi letar efter dig som har:


Minst 5 års dokumenterad arbetserfarenhet inom maskininlärning eller liknande område
Erfarenhet av att utveckla och implementera maskininlärningsmodeller
Gedigen erfarenhet inom minst ett programmeringsspråk (te.x. Python, Scala eller R)
Erfarenhet av SQL och databashantering
Erfarenhet av dataanalys- och visualiseringsverktyg så som Pandas, Matplotlib
Kunskap om maskininlärningsbibliotek som TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn
Behärskar god svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


Vad vi erbjuder:

Att vi trivs tillsammans på B3 Link är otroligt viktigt. Anledningen till att många börjar hos oss är bland annat det stora fokuset på kompetensutveckling, där vi kontinuerligt delar kunskap med varandra och uppmuntrar till kompetensutveckling och certifieringar. Vi erbjuder bland annat:


Generös kompetensutveckling
Attraktiv lönemodell
En fantastisk wellness- och medarbetarsatsning


Om B3

B3 Link är en del av B3-koncernen. B3 är en börsnoterad koncern och trygg arbetsgivare med hög medarbetarnöjdhet. B3 har ca 1000 medarbetare inom många olika expertområden. B3 är rankad som Sveriges tredje bästa arbetsplats 2021 av Great Place to Work, utsett till Sveriges IT Karriärföretag 2022 och 2023, samt vann utmärkelsen Årets Karriärföretag 2022. Vi lever efter våra värdeord erfarenhet, olikheter och energi samt satsar på hållbarhet i alla led. Vi tror att medarbetare som mår bra presterar bättre och har därför B3 Team som anordnar aktiviteter inom wellness, från yoga och löpning till musikquiz och föreläsningar om stresshantering och mental hälsa.

Varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag!

Har du frågor om tjänsten? Tveka inte att kontakta rekryteringsansvarig, Petra, för denna tjänst på petra.magnusson@b3.se
Show more

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Are you ready to bring the next generation of character animation tools to game developers worldwide—while working in a fast-moving startup at the forefront of Generative AI?




This is your opportunity.




At Motorica, we believe that words articulate thought, but motion expresses the soul. We are a cutting-edge startup operating at the intersection of Generative AI and entertainment, where creativity and deep-tech collide.

About Motorica




Our platform—recognized as a research and product leader in the emerging motion modality (one of the six fundamental generative AI modalities alongside image, video, audio, text, and geometry)—enables game studios to create dynamic, lifelike animation faster and more affordably than ever before.




Our foundational model provides AAA quality animations used by some of the biggest names in gaming.




We are currently onboarding multiple AAA+ game studios, that are currently building games with world-renowned IP, to use Motorica within their top titles.




We’re a small, fast-moving team, so you can make a real difference from day one.

What You’ll Do as a ML Engineer




Immerse yourself in an academic-led environment where you’ll pioneer ML / Generative AI research within the motion field.




Drive innovations to production, ensuring that creative people love to use the AI you help build.




Collaborate with world-leading experts in generative modeling, breathing life into characters for gaming, entertainment, and beyond.




Contribute to proprietary, state-of-the-art models, pushing the boundaries of what motion-generation technology can do.




What We’re Looking For




Solid foundation in deep learning and probabilistic machine learning




Excellent ability to implement innovations from machine-learning research papers, especially in deep generative modeling




Strong software development skills (Python, PyTorch)




Good command of spoken English and decent written English skills

Meritorious Skills/Experience




Experience implementing diffusion models (or flow matching, rectified flows, or consistency models)




3D animation and/or motion capture data expertise




Published papers at conferences like SIGGRAPH or CVPR, or outstanding contributions to relevant open-source projects




Other notable experience in deep generative modeling

Potentially Useful Skills/Experience




Signal-processing knowledge




Personal Traits




Intellectual curiosity – always questioning and exploring




Strong team communication skills




Hacker mentality – eager to get things working, but never sloppy




Analytical and critical thinker – challenge us to think differently!




Why You’ll Be Excited to Work Here




We are world leaders in what we do, with a core focus on generative machine learning.




We solve real problems—building AI that creative people in the gaming and entertainment industries love to use.




You’ll work with a small and nimble team, which means fast decision-making and a chance to have a real impact.




You’ll push the cutting edge with proprietary, state-of-the-art models that provide AAA quality animations.




We’ve recently signed with top AAA studios, so your work will be part of globally recognized IP.




Compensation and Benefits




Retirement Plan




Insurance Package




Health Benefits (5000 SEK/year)




Stock Options




6 weeks vacation







Are you ready to take the leap, tackle real-world problems, and help shape how the world animates characters in games and beyond? Join Motorica, and let’s build the future of motion together.

Show more

  • We are world leaders in what we do, with a core focus on generative machine learning.


  • We solve real problems—building AI that creative people in the gaming and entertainment industries love to use.


  • You’ll work with a small and nimble team, which means fast decision-making and a chance to have a real impact.


  • You’ll push the cutting edge with proprietary, state-of-the-art models that provide AAA quality animations.


  • We’ve recently signed with top AAA studios, so your work will be part of globally recognized IP.


Compensation and Benefits


  • Retirement Plan


  • Insurance Package


  • Health Benefits (5000 SEK/year)


  • Stock Options


  • 6 weeks vacation



Are you ready to take the leap, tackle real-world problems, and help shape how the world animates characters in games and beyond? Join Motorica, and let’s build the future of motion together.

Title: Fraud Analyst/Data Scientist
Description:
Are you passionate about data-driven fraud prevention? We are looking for a Fraud Analyst/Data Scientist to join our fraud team. In this role, you will work with ML/AI models, advanced analytics, and real-time data to detect and prevent fraud.

You will analyze large datasets, develop predictive models, and create dashboards to track fraud patterns and trends. Working closely with Credit Underwriting, IT, and Data Engineering teams, you will help enhance fraud detection capabilities and optimize decision-making processes. Your work will play a key role in shaping data-driven fraud prevention strategies.

If you enjoy working with data, automation, and predictive analytics to solve real-world challenges, this is an exciting opportunity to make an impact in a fast-moving environment.

Who You Are


5+ years of experience in data science, analytics, or a related field.
Knowledge of machine learning techniques and statistical modeling.
Experience with SQL, Python, R, and data visualization tools (SAS, Power BI, Tableau, etc.).
Ability to translate data into insights and drive business decisions.
Experience in financial fraud prevention and/or fraud risk management is a plus.



Resurs in brief

At Resurs, we make everyday finances easier through innovative and customer-focused solutions. With customers across the Nordics and a team of around 700 colleagues, we are committed to delivering long-term value for individuals, businesses, and society. Being named a career company for the past six years, we have a strong focus on emphasizing both personal and professional growth. With an inclusive and diverse culture, we create a workplace where employees are valued, supported, and encouraged to reach their full potential.

Join an international team

Although we are based in the Nordics, our team is enriched by the breadth of perspectives brought by colleagues from countries such as South Africa, Australia, Iran, Germany, New Zealand, the US, and India. We foster a welcoming and supportive culture, where collaboration drives us to achieve the best outcomes for our users.

Apply today!

Don’t wait to send in your application. Selection and interviews take place on an ongoing basis, and the position may be filled before the last application date.

We look forward to hearing from you!

Important information

On final candidates, we carry out a detailed background check via an external company.


In this recruitment process, the supplier is solely responsible for the personal data they collect and process. Resurs is solely responsible for the personal data processed by us in the recruitment process.



Resurs has more than 40 years of experience in retail finance and is one of the leading niche banks in the Nordics. We help companies and private individuals with lending, savings and payments. Today, we have a customer base of slightly more than 6 million customers and around 650 employees in the Nordic region.

Follow us on Instagram:

Title: Summer Intern (Machine Learning)
Description:
Summer Internship: AI-Powered Pricing for Cohort Financing

Location: Remote / Flexible

Duration: Summer 2025

This internship focuses on developing an AI-powered pricing tool that optimizes financing terms based on customer cohort data. The tool will provide the optimal financing amount (X) and interest rate (p) to maximize profitability while maintaining a specified risk range.

Project Details


Risk Modeling: Build a machine learning model to predict financing risk using customer Lifetime Value (LTV) and churn volatility.
Profitability Optimization: Develop an optimization framework to determine the best financing amount (X) and interest rate (p).
Pricing Tool Development: Integrate risk and profitability models into a functional prototype with user-adjustable risk parameters.
Documentation & Evaluation: Deliver a well-documented prototype demonstrating the tool’s functionality.


Scope


Focus on modeling and prototyping, not full implementation.
Provide clear analysis and evaluation of the pricing tool.


Who Should Apply?


Students in Computer Science, Data Science, Finance, or related fields.
Experience with Python, ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn).
Understanding of optimization, risk modeling, and financial concepts is a plus.


What is Gilion?

At Gilion, we’re building the world’s largest Growth Platform for founders. Our technology is at the heart of everything we do, enabling entrepreneurs to achieve their goals faster through innovative funding and analytics solutions. Our platform seamlessly connects raw business data to cutting-edge growth models, offering founders unparalleled insights and access to growth loans that are unmatched in the market.

We're a group of engineers hailing from leading innovators like Google, Spotify, King, Anyfin, and Einride. We've joined forces with some of the brightest minds in banking to assist entrepreneurs in growing their businesses smarter and faster. Traditionally, founders have been left to navigate the fundraising journey alone.

The Gilion platform offers immediate access to a powerful analytics tech stack, featuring intuitive visualizations and advanced forecasting without needing SQL or CSS. Our data-driven approach helps founders understand their performance compared to peers, as the industry shifts towards more objective, data-backed investment decisions. We’re fully committed to driving a new era for how entrepreneurs grow their ventures on a global scale.

Title: Senior ML Engineer
Description:
Company Description

We're an award-winning Google Cloud partner. We're the experts in transforming businesses and shaping the future of cloud technology. Join us and collaborate with top minds, build groundbreaking solutions, and make a real difference for our clients. Enjoy extensive professional development, global reach, and a supportive, Google-inspired culture. If you're passionate about the cloud, this is where you want to be.

With over 13 years of experience in Google Cloud under our belt, offices in 18 countries and more than 600 experts, we have deployed practical innovation alongside Google. We focus on infrastructure modernisation, data management, smart analytics, application modernisation, and AI & machine learning.

Curious about our projects? We got you: Check out our success stories


Job Description

Day-to-day life

Design, develop, and deploy cutting-edge machine learning models – crafting bespoke AI solutions for our Nordic clients.
Collaborate with data scientists, data engineers, and Google experts to overcome complex challenges and deliver impactful outcomes.
Champion knowledge sharing and mentorship, guiding junior colleagues in the art of machine learning and fostering a culture of continuous learning.
Stay at the forefront of Google Cloud AI/ML technologies, continuously expanding your expertise and exploring new possibilities.
Confidently present solutions to clients, bridging the gap between complex algorithms and real-world business value, while actively cultivating and expanding those customer relationships.



Want to know more? Check out our people stories on Youtube


Qualifications

We're seeking a passionate and experienced ML Engineer with a proven track record in designing, developing, and deploying machine learning models. You'll be a cloud enthusiast with a deep understanding of AI/ML principles and hands-on experience with cloud technologies. As a coding expert, you'll possess strong Python skills and a solid foundation in machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, LangChain, LangGraph).



Excellent communication is essential – you'll build strong relationships with clients, translate their needs into innovative AI solutions, and present complex topics with clarity and confidence. You're a true collaborator, thriving in team environments where knowledge sharing and mutual support are paramount.

Fluency in both Swedish and English is required.


Additional Information

Why Choose Devoteam G Cloud?

Own the AI revolution: Dive into the exciting world of Generative AI and ML, playing a pivotal role in shaping projects around Google's groundbreaking Gemini foundation model.
Innovative Impact: Work on the forefront of cloud technology at a globally recognized leader in Google Cloud solutions.
Direct Google Connection: Collaborate closely with Google teams, shaping the future of cloud and AI.
Unleash Your Expertise: Thrive in a fast-paced environment where sharing knowledge and success is paramount.
End-to-End Impact: Drive complete business transformations, from strategy to implementation and beyond.
Accelerate Your Career: Grow within a Google-inspired culture, gaining specialisations and certifications.



"Partnering with Devoteam has been a highlight of our efforts at Google Cloud. Their dedication and expertise elevate every project we undertake together. It's truly a collaboration that delivers exceptional results." — Alexander Percivall, Senior Partner Engineer, Google Cloud Nordics, Stockholm, Sweden.

We do plenty of activities, like meet-ups, hackathons, and partnerships. Don’t lose any of them: follow us on LinkedIn

Benefits

Encouragement and support for training and certification, in the form of coaching from other team members, cost coverage, and financial incentives.
Challenging and rewarding assignments, many of which are end-to-end.
A hybrid work model as standard, with flexible working hours and location to support your work-life balance.
An international, diverse, and inclusive team.
A human-centric and value-based company culture.
Wellness grants for sports activities (5,000 SEK/year).
A modern office in central Stockholm.
Full provision of work tools.
A variety of social events.



Our culture is based on continuous learning and career development, supported by a genuine, inclusive, and expert team that really loves pizza.

 

Want to know more about life at Devoteam? Check our Instagram page

Ready to join an elite team? Apply for our Senior ML Engineer position and become part of something exceptional!

Is this not the right position for you? Don’t worry, we have plenty of opportunities! Check out our Career page

 

Show more
